title: Dell SE2717HX 27" IPS Monitor
description:
Dell SE2717HX Monitor
(click "show more" below for details)

27" IPS Display
16.7 million colors
300 cdm (brightness)
8 million : 1 dynamic color contrast ratio
1000 : 1 contrast ratio
6 ms response time

VGA
HDMI 1.4 (Dell doesn't specify. newegg claims)

20 - 31 watt power consumption
12.87 lbs.

Anti-Glare 3H Hard Coating
Free Sync
Flicker-Free
Nothing for wall mounting
All that being said I would NEVER recommend Dell products to anyone. they are a company that absolutely doesn't deserve to be in business. 
The way they run their company is completely un-acceptable and flat out appalling.
